data.name: TouHou Music Recording
data.detailed_description:
This is a TouHou doujin music recording game.
Player plays the roles int gensokyo, traveling across gensokyo, while recording various songs at the same time.
In "Free Mode", player can choose the songs he like.
When the song is playing, yellow notes will come out with the rolling disk.
Player can press certain keys to record the music.
The more accurately one presses, the higher the score will be.
If one makes a wrong press, the score will drop.
Player can enter "Tutorial" to learn more detailed operations.
"Travel Mode" is used for unlocking certain songs, reading the story and playing with different disks.
"My Album" is used for constructing one's own songs, notes and skins.
Enjoy the fun of recording music !

data.short_description: Another incident hit Gensokyo,in totally SILENCE. This time, Hieda no Akyuu- the girl buried in Gensokyo Chronicles, now was pulled up to fix the history on her own! "TouHou Music Recording" is dedicated to all Touhou Music lovers. Be prepared to start a bizarre journey with Akuu right now.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: x86_64
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-10210U CPU @ 1.60GHz 2.11 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: MX250
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: AC'97
  • Additional Notes: 无
